project.lima

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.lima.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents a player of the game.

        public void setCredits(int credit)
        this method modifies by the players health by adding integer value credit to its current health
        Parameters:
        credit - the number to be added to the player's current credits

      • setNewCredits

        public void setNewCredits(int credits)
        Method to modify player health by directly replacing the current credits with either a new int value or the player's maximum credits, whichever is smaller.
        Parameters:
        credits - int representing the desired new value for this Player's credits.

      • setWcp

        public void setWcp(int wcp)
        Sets the player's wcp.
        Parameters:
        wcp - number of wcp after method call

      • draw

        public void draw()
        draw a card from the deck into the hand, as long as the hand does not exceed its card limit of 10 cards

      • playCard

        public Card playCard(int index)
              throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        plays a card from the hand on to the board, as long as the board does not exceed its card limit of 7 cards modifies the player's Wildcat Points resource accordingly
        Parameters:
        index - the array index of the card in the player's hand
        Returns:
        the card that was played
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - is thrown if a card costs too much or if the board array is already full

      • addCardtoHand

        public void addCardtoHand(int index)
        add card to hand from the board, used in abilities like STreturnhand
        Parameters:
        index - the array index of the card on the board that needs to be added to the hand

      • addCardtoBoard

        public void addCardtoBoard(Card card)
        adds a card to board, doesn't necessarily need to be in a player's hand
        Parameters:
        card - the card to add to the board

      • removeCardFromBoard

        public void removeCardFromBoard(int index)
        removes a card from the board based on array index
        Parameters:
        index - the array index of the card to be removed from the board

      • removeCardFromBoard

        public void removeCardFromBoard(Card card)
        removes a card from the board by searching for that Card's attributes through the board array
        Parameters:
        card - the card to be removed form the board

      • addCardToHand

        public void addCardToHand(Card card)
        adds any card to the player's hand

        card - the card to be added to the hand

        public void clearHand()
        clears the player's hand. mostly used in testing
